home.heading: Marketing is not easy anymore, let us help you stand out
home.desc: Building the best strategy for your business

services.heading: What can we do for you?
services.brandAwarenessDesc: Looking for results that matter? We bring expertise, creativity, and a personal touch to deliver services tailored to your needs. Elevate your experience and watch your goals turn into reality.
services.leadGenerationDesc: Ready to grow your customer base? Our lead generation services are designed to attract, engage, and convert. We target the right audience, capture high-quality leads, and help you turn prospects into loyal customers.
services.contentCreationDesc: Need content that stops the scroll? We’ve got you covered. From eye-catching visuals to engaging posts, we create content that sparks conversations and connects with your audience.
services.performanceMarketingDesc: We’re all about results that matter. From crafting targeted campaigns to analyzing performance, we make sure every click and impression brings value to your brand. Let’s turn those views into loyal customers and that ad spend into real growth.
services.emailMarketingDesc: Stay top-of-mind with your audience. Our email marketing services craft personalized campaigns that nurture relationships, increase engagement, and drive sales. From automation to segmentation. Let's turn your subscribers into loyal customers.
services.marketingStrategyDesc: Without a clear strategy, even the best ideas fall short. Our marketing strategy services provide a tailored roadmap to guide your business toward growth. From market research to execution, we create a plan that aligns with your goals and maximizes your impact.

quoteBanner.text: In an ever-changing world, we anchor to

contactUs.heading: Want to know more about us?
contactUs.subheading: Because we want to know more about you.
contactUs.errorMessage2: We will be glad if you just call us :)
contactUs.successMessage2: Expect an email or a call back from us in the next 24 hours.

whyUs.heading: Why Us?
whyUs.text1: At Wild Marketing Agency were not just another marketing team-were a group of motivated, creative, and driven young professionals with a track record of success. Our experience with brands in B2B and B2C has taught us what it takes to deliver impactful results. We combine fresh perspectives with proven expertise to bring your business the attention, growth, and success it deserves.
whyUs.text2: Choose Wild Marketing Agency if you're ready to work with a team that brings fresh ideas and a strong work ethic. Let's create something extraordinary together.

item1.title: Because we aim for positive marketing
item1.description: We believe in empowering businesses with marketing that is ethical and impactful.

item2.title: Because our vision is different
item2.description: We see marketing as more than just a sales tool; it’s about building relationships.

item3.title: Because we drive results
item3.description: Our strategies focus on delivering measurable, sustainable results for your business.

item4.title: Because we innovate continuously
item4.description: Our team stays on top of trends to ensure your brand is always ahead.

item5.title: Because we prioritize customer relationships
item5.description: Your customers are at the heart of everything we do.

step1.title: Meeting
step1.explanation: We get to know your brand, your goals and your vision. It's all about understanding how we can help you grow.

step2.title: Blueprint
step2.explanation: We craft a customized plan tailored to your needs. We'll present creative solutions designed to elevate your digital presence and make a real impact.

step3.title: Final Meeting
step3.explanation: Once we align on the strategy, we become your dedicated partners. Our team is here to work alongside you, driving your brand forward with passion and innovation.

step4.title: Working together
step4.explanation: Time to turn ideas into action. We execute the plan, measure the results, and keep optimizing to ensure your brand's success in the digital space.

facts.title: We help ambitious companies meet & exceed their goals with

fact1.heading: 500К
fact1.text: Delivered over 500 000 views for one of our clients by crafting engaging, humor-driven content designed to captivate their audience. Each piece of content was strategically created to prompt a specific action, driving measurable engagement and results.

fact2.heading: 8.0/ROAS
fact2.text: Summer week campaign for e-commerce brand with budget 500EUR and we generate over 4000EUR and 50+ purchases. Which means that for every 1EUR spent we generated 8EUR.

fact3.text: 25 000 page views events for a specific campaign for 1 month. We used to manage Google ads (Search ads and Pmax ads) with average CPC 0.27BGN

fact4.text: We bet on pin/targeted locations, look alike audiences, good copywriting and good banners with CTA’s. We use to manage META ads for brand awarness and we generated over 100 leads, for just 3 week campaign

footer.socialsDescription: Our goal is to keep you updated and entertained
